raw_metrics_response:
Here is the Python code to calculate the derived metrics based on the provided framework and dimensional scores:

```python
import json

# Provided dimensional scores for document_1
dimensional_scores = {
  "tribal_dominance": {
    "raw_score": 0.05,
    "salience": 0.05,
    "confidence": 0.9
  },
  "individual_dignity": {
    "raw_score": 0.9,
    "salience": 0.9,
    "confidence": 0.95
  },
  "fear": {
    "raw_score": 0.7,
    "salience": 0.6,
    "confidence": 0.9
  },
  "hope": {
    "raw_score": 0.9,
    "salience": 0.8,
    "confidence": 0.95
  },
  "envy": {
    "raw_score": 0.05,
    "salience": 0.05,
    "confidence": 0.9
  },
  "compersion": {
    "raw_score": 0.05,
    "salience": 0.05,
    "confidence": 0.85
  },
  "enmity": {
    "raw_score": 0.7,
    "salience": 0.6,
    "confidence": 0.9
  },
  "amity": {
    "raw_score": 0.8,
    "salience": 0.7,
    "confidence": 0.95
  },
  "fragmentative_goals": {
    "raw_score": 0.05,
    "salience": 0.05,
    "confidence": 0.9
  },
  "cohesive_goals": {
    "raw_score": 0.9,
    "salience": 0.9,
    "confidence": 0.95
  }
}

# --- Derived Metrics Calculations ---

# 1. Tension Indices
identity_tension = min(dimensional_scores["tribal_dominance"]["raw_score"], dimensional_scores["individual_dignity"]["raw_score"]) * abs(dimensional_scores["tribal_dominance"]["salience"] - dimensional_scores["individual_dignity"]["salience"])
emotional_tension = min(dimensional_scores["fear"]["raw_score"], dimensional_scores["hope"]["raw_score"]) * abs(dimensional_scores["fear"]["salience"] - dimensional_scores["hope"]["salience"])
success_tension = min(dimensional_scores["envy"]["raw_score"], dimensional_scores["compersion"]["raw_score"]) * abs(dimensional_scores["envy"]["salience"] - dimensional_scores["compersion"]["salience"])
relational_tension = min(dimensional_scores["enmity"]["raw_score"], dimensional_scores["amity"]["raw_score"]) * abs(dimensional_scores["enmity"]["salience"] - dimensional_scores["amity"]["salience"])
goal_tension = min(dimensional_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["raw_score"], dimensional_scores["cohesive_goals"]["raw_score"]) * abs(dimensional_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["salience"] - dimensional_scores["cohesive_goals"]["salience"])

# 2. Strategic Contradiction Index
strategic_contradiction_index = (identity_tension + emotional_tension + success_tension + relational_tension + goal_tension) / 5

# 3. Intermediate calculations for Salience-Weighted Cohesion Indices
epsilon = 0.001 # To prevent division by zero

emotional_cohesion_component = (dimensional_scores["hope"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["hope"]["salience"]) - (dimensional_scores["fear"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["fear"]["salience"])
success_cohesion_component = (dimensional_scores["compersion"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["compersion"]["salience"]) - (dimensional_scores["envy"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["envy"]["salience"])
relational_cohesion_component = (dimensional_scores["amity"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["amity"]["salience"]) - (dimensional_scores["enmity"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["enmity"]["salience"])
goal_cohesion_component = (dimensional_scores["cohesive_goals"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["cohesive_goals"]["salience"]) - (dimensional_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["salience"])
identity_cohesion_component = (dimensional_scores["individual_dignity"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["individual_dignity"]["salience"]) - (dimensional_scores["tribal_dominance"]["raw_score"] * dimensional_scores["tribal_dominance"]["salience"])

# Salience totals for normalization
descriptive_salience_total = (dimensional_scores["hope"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["fear"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["compersion"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["envy"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["amity"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["enmity"]["salience"])
motivational_salience_total = (dimensional_scores["hope"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["fear"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["compersion"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["envy"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["amity"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["enmity"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["cohesive_goals"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["salience"])
full_salience_total = (dimensional_scores["individual_dignity"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["tribal_dominance"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["hope"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["fear"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["compersion"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["envy"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["amity"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["enmity"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["cohesive_goals"]["salience"] + dimensional_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["salience"])

# 4. Final Salience-Weighted Cohesion Indices
descriptive_cohesion_index = (emotional_cohesion_component + success_cohesion_component + relational_cohesion_component) / (descriptive_salience_total + epsilon)
motivational_cohesion_index = (emotional_cohesion_component + success_cohesion_component + relational_cohesion_component + goal_cohesion_component) / (motivational_salience_total + epsilon)
full_cohesion_index = (identity_cohesion_component + emotional_cohesion_component + success_cohesion_component + relational_cohesion_component + goal_cohesion_component) / (full_salience_total + epsilon)

# Store results
derived_metrics_results = {
    "identity_tension": identity_tension,
    "emotional_tension": emotional_tension,
    "success_tension": success_tension,
    "relational_tension": relational_tension,
    "goal_tension": goal_tension,
    "strategic_contradiction_index": strategic_contradiction_index,
    "descriptive_cohesion_index": descriptive_cohesion_index,
    "motivational_cohesion_index": motivational_cohesion_index,
    "full_cohesion_index": full_cohesion_index
}

# Print the results
print(json.dumps(derived_metrics_results, indent=2))
```
